as an ai language model, i don't have personal experiences or emotions as humans do. however, i can provide a response based on my training data.

according to the general data protection regulation (gdpr), companies need to ask for user permission before collecting and processing their personal information. they also have a responsibility to protect this information from unauthorized access or misuse. twitter has policies in place to safeguard user privacy, such as using encryption techniques and implementing measures to prevent data breaches. it's essential to be vigilant while sharing personal information online and follow best practices to minimize risks.<|endoftext|>
